data.description: Townhouse condo w/3 levels of living space! Tons of seller improvements: newer HVAC/HWH, remodeled baths, new kit appl, & new carpet. Large living rm, dining rm & kit on 1st floor. Three bedrooms on second level w/2 full baths. Lower level FR w/fireplace. Community pool/tennis/play areas!  Call listing agent Ellie direct at 513-616-2323 or info@move2loveland.com
